arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحْيَاكُمْ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُحْيِيكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَكَفُورٌۭ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Wohi	 Hai	 Jisne	 tumheiñ	 zinda	 kiya	
phir	 tumheiñ	 māregā	 phir	 tumheiñ	
jilāyegā	be-shak	ādmi	badā	nā-shukrā	hai

arabicText: لِّكُلِّ أُمَّةٍۢ جَعَلْنَا مَنسَكًا هُمْ نَاسِكُوهُ ۖ فَلَا يُنَـٰزِعُنَّكَ فِى ٱلْأَمْرِ ۚ وَٱدْعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًۭى مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
For	 each	 nation	We	 have	made	 the	 rules	
of	 worship	 for	 them	 to	 follow	- so	 never	
should	 they	 quarrel	 with	 you	 in	 this	
matter	 – and	 call	 them	 towards	 your	
Lord;	 indeed	 you	 are	 upon	 the	 Straight	
Path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Har	 Ummat	 ke	 liye	 Hamne	 ibādat	 ke	
Q’āide	banā	diye	ke	woh	unpar	chaleiñ	to	
har-giz	woh	tumse	is	muāmle	meiñ	jhagdā	
na	 kareñ	aur	apne	Rab	ki	 taraf	 bulāo	 beshak	tum	seedhi	rāh	par	ho

arabicText: وَإِن جَـٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 they	 quarrel	 with	 you,	 say,	 “Allah
well	knows	your	evil	deeds.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	woh	tumse	jhagdeiñ	to	farmā	do	
ke	Allah	khoob	jānta	hai	tumhāre	kotak

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فِيمَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Allah will	 judge	 between	 you	 on	 the	 Day	
of	 Resurrection	 concerning	 what	 you	
dispute.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	tum	meiñ	faisla	kardegā	Qayāmat	ke	
din	jis	bāt	meiñ	ikhtilāf	kar	rahe	ho.

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ فِى كِتَـٰبٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Did	 you	 not	 realise	 that	 Allah knows	 all	
that	 is	 in	 the	 heavens	 and	 in	 the	 earth?	
Indeed	all	this	is	in	a	Book;	indeed	this	is	
easy	for	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā	tune	na	jānā	ke	Allah	jānta	hai	jo	kuch	
āsmānoñ	 aur	 zameen	 meiñ	 hai	 be-shak	
yeh	 sab	 ek	 Kitāb	 meiñ	 hai	 be-shak	 yeh	
Allah	par	āasān	hai.

arabicText: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يُنَزِّلْ بِهِۦ سُلْطَـٰنًۭا وَمَا لَيْسَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عِلْمٌۭ ۗ وَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	 worship	 those	 instead	 of	 Allah
regarding	whom	He	has	not	sent	down	any	proof,	and	those	regarding	whom	they	themselves	
do	not	have	any	knowledge;	and	there	are	no	supporters	for	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ke	siwā	aiso	ko	poojte	haiñ	jinki	koi	sanad	usne	na	utāri	aur	aiso	ko	jinka	khud	unheiñ	
kuch	Ílm	nahiñ	aur	sitamgāroñ	ka	koi	madad-gār	nahiñ.

arabicText: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلْمُنكَرَ ۖ يَكَادُونَ يَسْطُونَ بِٱلَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا ۗ قُلْ أَفَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِشَرٍّۢ مِّن ذَٰلِكُمُ ۗ ٱلنَّارُ وَعَدَهَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	Our	clear	verses	are	recited	to	them,	you	will	see	traces	of	anger	in	the	faces	of	the	
disbelievers;	possibly	they	may	attack	those	who	recite	Our	verses	to	them;	say,	“Shall	I	show	
you	 what	 is	 worse	 than	 your	 current	 state?	 That	 is	 the	 fire!	 Allah has	 promised	 it	 to	 the	
disbelievers;	and	what	a	wretched	place	to	return!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	un	par	Hamāri	raushan	Āyateiñ	padhi	jāyeiñ	to	tum	unke	chehroñ	par	bigadne	ke	āsār	
dekhoge	jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiya	qareeb	hai	ke	palat	padeiñ	unko	jo	hamāri	Āyateiñ	unpar	padhte	
haiñ,	tum	farmādo	kya	maiñ	tumheiñ	batā	duñ	jo	tumhāre	is	hāl	se	bhi	bad-tar	hai	woh	āg	hai	
Allah	ne	iskā	w’adā	diyā	hai	kāfiroñ	ko	aur	kya	hi	buri	palatne	ki	jagāh.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ضُرِبَ مَثَلٌۭ فَٱسْتَمِعُوا۟ لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَن يَخْلُقُوا۟ ذُبَابًۭا وَلَوِ ٱجْتَمَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ ۖ وَإِن يَسْلُبْهُمُ ٱلذُّبَابُ شَيْـًۭٔا لَّا يَسْتَنقِذُوهُ مِنْهُ ۚ ضَعُفَ ٱلطَّالِبُ وَٱلْمَطْلُوبُ
englishTranslationText:
O	 people,	 an	 example	is	 being	illustrated	
therefore	 listen	 to	 it	 attentively;	 “Those	
whom	 you	 worship	 besides	 Allah can	
never	 create	 a	 fly	 even	 if	 they	 all	 come	
together	 for	 it;	 and	 if	 a	 fly	 took	 away	
something	 from	 them,	 they	 cannot	
retrieve	 that	 from	 it; how	 weak	 are	 the	
seeker	and	the	sought!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aye	logo, ek	kahāwat	farmāyi	jāti	hai	isey	
kān	 lagākar	 suno; “Woh	 jinheiñ	 Allah	 ke	
siwā	 tum	 poojte	 ho	 ek	 Makkhi	 na	 banā	
sakeñge	 agar-che	 sab	 uspar	 ekhatte	 ho	
jayeiñ; aur	 agar	Makkhi	 unse	 kuch	 cheen	
kar	 le	 jāye, to	 us-se	 churdā	 na	 sakeiñ;
kitnā	 kamzor	 chāhne	 wāla	 aur	 woh	 jisko	
chāhā!”

arabicText: مَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ
englishTranslationText:
They	 did	 not	 realise	 the	 importance	 of	
Allah as	 was	 His	 right;	 indeed	 Allah is	
Almighty,	Dominant.
romanUrduTranslationText: Allah	 ki	Qadr	 na	jāni	jaisi	 chāhiye	 thi	 beshak	Allah	Quwwat	wāla	Ghālib	hai

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ يَصْطَفِى مِنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلًۭا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Allah chooses	the	Noble	Messengers	from	
the	angels,	and	from	men;	indeed	Allah is	
All	Hearing,	All	Seeing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	 chun	 letā	 hai	 Firishtoñ	 meiñ	 se	
Rasool	aur	ādmiyoñ	meiñ	se	be-shak	Allah	
suntā	dekhtā	hai

arabicText: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
englishTranslationText:
. He	 knows	 all	 that	 is	 before	 them	 and	 all	
that	is	behind	them;	and	towards	Allah is	
the	return	of	all	matters.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jāntā	 hai	 jo	 unke	 āage	 hai	 aur	 jo	 unke	
peeche	hai	aur	sab	kāmoñ	ki	ruju’	Allah	ki	
taraf	hai	.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ وَٱسْجُدُوا۟ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ وَٱفْعَلُوا۟ ٱلْخَيْرَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ ۩
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe,	bow	and	prostrate	
yourselves,	 and	 worship	 your	 Lord,	 and	
do	 good	 deeds	 in	 the	 hope	 of	 attaining	
salvation.	(Command	of	Prostration as	per	
Imam	 Shaafi	 – may	Allah be	 pleased	 with	
him)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aye	 Imān	wāloñ,	Ruku’ aur	 Sajdah karo	 aur	 apne	Rab	 ki	bandagi	 karo	 aur	 bhale	 kām	 karo	is	
ummeed	 par	 ke	 tumheiñ	 chutkārā	 ho. (Sajde	 ka	 Hukm,	 Imam	 Shaafi	 Alayhir	 Rahma	 ke	
nazdeek)

arabicText: وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ فِى ٱللَّهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهِۦ ۚ هُوَ ٱجْتَبَىٰكُمْ وَمَا جَعَلَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ مِنْ حَرَجٍۢ ۚ مِّلَّةَ أَبِيكُمْ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۚ هُوَ سَمَّىٰكُمُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ مِن قَبْلُ وَفِى هَـٰذَا لِيَكُونَ ٱلرَّسُولُ شَهِيدًا عَلَيْكُمْ وَتَكُونُوا۟ شُهَدَآءَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ ۚ فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱعْتَصِمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ هُوَ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۖ فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَوْلَىٰ وَنِعْمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
And	 fight	 in	 Allah's	 cause	 as	 is	 the	 true	
manner	of	 fighting;	He	has	preferred	you	and	has	not	kept	any	hardship	upon	you	in	religion;	
the	religion	of	your	father	Ibrahim;	Allah has	named	you	Muslims	– in	the	previous	Books	and	
in	this	Qur’an,	so	that	the	Noble	Messenger	be	your	guardian	and	witness,	and	you	be	witness	
against	other	people;	 therefore	keep	 the	prayer	established	and	give	charity,	and	hold	 fast	 to	
the	 rope	 of	 Allah;	 He	 is	 your	 Master;	 so what	 an	 excellent	 Master	 and	 what	 an	 excellent	
Supporter!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	Jihād karo	jaisā	Haq	hai	Jihād karne	ka	usne	tumheiñ	pasand	kiya	aur	tum	
par	 deen	 meiñ	 kuchh	 tangi	 nā	 rakhi,	 tumhāre	 bāp	 Ibrāhim ka	 deen	 Allah	 ne	 tumhārā	 nām	
Musalmān	 rakhā	 hai	 agli	Kitāboñ	 meiñ	 aur	 is	Qur’ān meiñ	 tāke	Rasool	 tumhārā	 nigehbān-ogawāh	ho,	aur	 tum	aur	logoñ	par	gawāhi	do	 to	Namāz barpā	 rakho	aur	Zakāt do	aur	Allah	ki	
Rassi	 mazboot	 thām	 lo Woh	 tumhārā	 Maulā	 hai	 to	 kya	 hi	 achchā	 Maulā	 aur	 kya	 hi	 achchā	
madadgār.
